name: Dodge Blocks- Avoid the Blocks
description:
Dodge Blocks is a simple, fun, and challenging new game! The ball will continuously move in an up and down motion. The objective is to keep your finger on the screen and control the balls left and right motion only. Guide the balls movement and help the dodge the flying blocks. Try to dodge as many blocks as possible to get a high score!

Tip: Place your finger in the open space near the bottom of the screen and only move your finger left or right to avoid blocking your view and for best game play.

* Gather shields that will protect you when you crash into a block.

* Collect coins and use them to upgrade your ball or to Continue gameplay after Game Over scene.

Game Features:
- Simple and easy swipe controls
- Endless gameplay
- Share your score with your friends and see who gets the best score


(Royalty Free Music provided by Bensound)
